Text: hey guys, quick question, do i have to do anything to these files or should they play on my ps3 like they are ? because my ps3 isn't picking them up from my ex hdd, they play though my tv's own media player once i change the format to mpg. just wondering why the ps3 wont play them.
Any light on this matter would be appreciated.
Don't know, they work fine for me - I copy them to the internal PS3 HDD using a memory stick.
Ok no worries, will I loose any quality of the movies changing them from m2ts to mpg ?
Thanks halfmonkey i love the PS3 -team releases thank you very much. Is HDME still the site the rest of the team uploads on or have you guys moved else where?
